name: DTaPVaccine
title: DTaP Vaccine
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for immunizations with diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis (DTaP) vaccines.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Immunization.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis (DTaP) vaccine.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
